author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Braille handout to aid visually challenged in casting their vote was issued here to the members of Visually Challenged Society of Krishnagiri by Collector C. Kathiravan recently.

Visually challenged and differently-abled persons may verify their voter status by typing their EPIC number and send an SMS to 1950.

The information of the voting booth and all other relevant details pertaining to the voter will be sent.

A copy of the Braille handout is also made available at the district library here for the benefit of the visually challenged persons to cast their votes.
title: Handout distributed
